text: Hypoiodous acid is a chemical compound. It is also an acid. Its chemical formula is HIO. It has hydrogen and hypoiodite ions in it. ==Properties== Hypoiodous acid is very unstable. It easily disproportionates to iodine and iodic acid. It is a disinfectant and oxidizing agent. ==Preparation== It is made by reacting mercury(II) oxide with iodine. ==Uses== It is too unstable to be used, although people think that this is what makes iodine a disinfectant. ==Related pages== *Iodic acid *Periodic acid Category:Hypohalous acids Category:Iodine compounds
title: Hypoiodous acid
